title: Ride or Die
description: Aspen's love life with bad boy biker Liam takes a hit when she spots her abusive ex in town. Now, Liam wants to know why Aspen won't respond to his touch, and he's getting pretty fed up. To make matters worse, MC queen Shayna is watching Aspen's every move, waiting for the perfect moment to antagonize the newbie. As usual, Aspen's life is far from easy, but the Skull Kings are always there to help in unexpected ways.Skull Kings MC Series#1- First Time Rider#2- Ride or Die
author: Sage L. Morgan
